name: js-sw-cache-kit
description: Service Worker + API for smart static asset caching with seed/purge control and metrics.

scripts.build:copy: cp src/sw-worker.js dist/sw-worker.js && cp src/sw-cache-api.js dist/sw-cache-api.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:min: npm run build && npm run build:min:worker && npm run build:min:client
